com.ca.codesv.api

Interface ProtocolServer<T extends com.ca.codesv.sdk.Connection,R extends com.ca.codesv.sdk.ResponseBuilder>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RuntimeServer, TransactionVerificationProvider

    public interface ProtocolServer<T extends com.ca.codesv.sdk.Connection,R extends com.ca.codesv.sdk.ResponseBuilder>
extends RuntimeServer
    ProtocolServer represents a view on the virtual server which has been configured using a particular protocol.
